mapper.insert: insert into tb_sms_send_check (sms_id, req_id, sms_channel, user_id, sms_work, sms_send_code, sms_send_status, sms_send_msg, sms_check_code, sms_check_status, sms_check_msg, sms_send_time, sms_check_time, phone, status, remark) values (#{smsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsSendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsSendStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{smsSendMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsCheckCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{smsCheckStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsCheckMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{smsCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_sms_send_check set sms_check_code = #{smsCheckCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, sms_check_status = #{smsCheckStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sms_check_msg = #{smsCheckMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sms_check_time = #{smsCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = CONCAT(#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'|',remark) where sms_id = #{smsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sms_id, req_id, sms_channel, user_id, sms_work, sms_send_code, sms_send_status, sms_send_msg, sms_check_code, sms_check_status, sms_check_msg, sms_send_time, sms_check_time, phone, status, remark from tb_sms_send_check where sms_id = #{smsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sms_id, req_id, sms_channel, user_id, sms_work, sms_send_code, sms_send_status, sms_send_msg, sms_check_code, sms_check_status, sms_check_msg, sms_send_time, sms_check_time, phone, status, remark from tb_sms_send_check
